title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about natural language processing (nlp) in the cantonese language, and ways to pretrain language models with low resources
<|assistant|>
Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about natural language processing (NLP) in the Cantonese language, and ways to pretrain language models with low resources
Cantonese Language Processing: A Survey
This article provides an overview of the challenges and opportunities in NLP for Cantonese, and discusses recent research in this area
A Comparative Study of Word Embeddings for Cantonese Language Processing
This study compares different word embedding methods for Cantonese NLP and evaluates their performance
Cantonese Part-of-Speech Tagging Using Deep Learning
This article presents a deep learning-based approach to Cantonese POS tagging
Cantonese Dependency Parsing Using Recurrent Neural Networks
This study proposes a recurrent neural network-based approach to Cantonese dependency parsing
Cantonese Named Entity Recognition Using Convolutional Neural Networks
This article presents a CNN-based approach to Cantonese NER
Cantonese Text-to-Speech Synthesis Using Deep Learning
This study proposes a deep learning-based approach to Cantonese TTS synthesis
Cantonese Sentiment Analysis Using Deep Learning
This article presents a deep learning-based approach to Cantonese sentiment analysis
Cantonese Textual entailment Using Deep Learning
This study proposes a deep learning-based approach to textual entailment for Cantonese

This study proposes a deep learning-based approach to Cantonese text classification
